fr.sii.ogham.core.message.content

Class MultiTemplateContent

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sii.ogham.core.message.content.MultiContent
      • fr.sii.ogham.core.message.content.MultiTemplateContent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Content

    public class MultiTemplateContent
extends MultiContent

    A shortcut for using several templates with same context.

    You have to put all templates to include at once at the same place. Each file must be named identically. Only the extension must be different.

    Then you only need to indicate the path to the templates without any extension and provide the context.

    You can also specify all the extensions to append to the template path. By default, the extensions will be "html" and "txt"

    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet

                            String... extensions)
        Initialize with the template path (without extension) and the context. You may also specify the extensions to use.

        templatePath - the path to the template (without extension)
        context - the context to share
        extensions - the extensions to specify
